entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: Make ScalarSubqueryExpression fully immutable #26532
  • Incorrect Entry when catching DBUpdateException #26530
  • Register a scoped `DbContext` automatically when using `AddPooledDbContextFactory` as well #26528
  • Using `GroupBy` with auto-generated expression passed to `Select` throws an exception in RC1 and RC2 #26525
  • EfCore incorrect SQL when altering column with type #26523
  • End-user way to add custom sql expression #26522
  • EF Core owned entity shadow PK causes null constraint violation with SQLite #26521

Closed

  • Related property key value resets when attaching a disconnected entity. #26490
  • Why the order of adding entities is not preserved?! #26524

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Cleanup regarding TODO notes #26533
    auto-merge
  • [6.0.1] RevEng: Consider skip navigation names when generating identifier for… #26531
    Servicing-consider
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Clean up on application exit #26529
    Servicing-consider
  • Evolve null-checking approach in extensions #26527
  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
  • [6.0.1] Avoid NRE in ForeignKeyAttributeConvention #26520
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 #26503
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26518
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26516
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26515
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore.InMemory #26509
